alert.note: Alert for Monroe; St. Clair (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 27 at 12:31AM CDT until September 27 at 1:15AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Monroe County in southwestern Illinois... Central St. Clair County in southwestern Illinois... South central St. Louis County in east central Missouri... * Until 115 AM CDT. * At 1231 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Columbia, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Waterloo, Columbia, Freeburg, Dupo, Millstadt, Lemay, Mehlville, Oakville, Smithton, East Carondelet, Hecker, Barr, Floraville, and Paderborn. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
